title: Corona Status
disclaimer: This site is personal initiative and doesn't provide medical advise. This form aims at building a more precise evaluation of the number of true COVID-19 cases and track it's evolution. No personal data is collected
modal.title: Thank you for your cooperation!
modal.content: You can now help people confined with you answer this form. Fill it in everyday to allow tracking the pandemic.
modal.retake: Retake this form with another person
headache.question: Do you have a headache, show muscular ache or feel tired?
fever.question: Do you have a fever?
breathing.question: Do you have trouble breathing?
